article_title: Fox Business Network’s Gerri Willis describes how 4-year-old Obamacare is like a ‘cranky toddler’ – twitchy.com

article_metadata.title: Fox Business Network's Gerri Willis describes how 4-year-old Obamacare is like a 'cranky toddler' - twitchy.com

article_summary:
Gerri Willis, host of “The Willis Report” on Fox Business Network, marked four years since Obamacare was signed into law with the above comparison.
— Me (@musicgirl77) March 24, 2014@GerriWillisFBN I hope I never see that cranky and expensive toddler when it's a teenager.
And unless it’s repealed, things will only get worse:@GerriWillisFBN @ttjemery And as children…just keep getting more and more expensive!
— Sergeant Hulka (@Hulka_Sgt) March 24, 2014Shudder.
